name: The Little Blue Car
description:
A fun little game made in a couple days for the UDC Jam #23 - Infinite Loop :)

Controls: 

Left Shift: lets car through on the left.

Right Shift: lets car through on the right.

Aim of the game: don't let the crossing cars get hit by the crazy blue car.

You can play one or two players.

Art made with Vectr
